stories.text: Everyone might have this dilemma at some point of time, in which you have some project ideas that you would like to work upon. All project ideas are close to heart( like you really want to work upon those). But how to evaluate which idea should you work upon? How do successful founders/entrepreneurs come to a decision like this is my thing and I am going to work upon this?
stories.title: Ask HN: How to evaluate which project idea should you work upon?
OpenAI Chief Scientist Says Advanced AI May Already Be Conscious

stories.text:
If your chatbot supports webhook or calling 3rd party API then you can easily extend your Chatbot with various NLP tasks like Sentiment Analysis or just simple classification etc.

Check out how to do this for one such app Chatbot.com at https://www.firstlanguage.in/extend-chatbot

Checkout the Medium article on it https://medium.com/@subalalitha_25475/extend-chatbot-with-firstlanguage-sentiment-analysis-api-a49f58b92961
stories.title: Extend your chatbot app with NLP tasks
